Motivation Letter
Respected Sir/Madam,
My name is Shashank Bhati and I am from India. I am a master student in the field of Business
Analytics at TU Freiberg. I got to know about this EURECA-PRO Summer School 2022 on Innovation
and Entrepreneurship via EUREKA-Pro. In addition to this motivation letter, I have also prepared a
video which I have also uploaded. Its also available online via this link
https://app.animaker.com/video/6DFDYS6813HUJUCC
I have been actively involved in university activities since the beginning of my master's degree. In the
freshman week I got to know my student council and learned more about their work. I found it very
interesting how this small group supported the students and organized attractive events for us.
That's why I decided to stand for the student council elections in May 2022. I also help the newly
arriving students with their arrival and their studies as I volunteer as a mentor in the Buddy Program
at the International University Centre. I was elected chair of the student group by EURECA-PRO.
EURECA-PRO is an alliance of 7 universities that have come together to enable students and
employees to study, teach and research in the field of responsible consumption and production. A
long-term goal of the project is to realize a common, virtual and integrated European campus by
2040. I look forward to connecting with students from all over Europe and applying my leadership
skills as I am not only the representative of the students but I also want to promote the connection
between students from all over Europe.
I completed my bachelor's degree in Computer Application at Jamia Hamdard University in 2020.
During my bachelor's degree, I also did a course "Data Science with Python". I have good
programming knowledge and analytical skills.
During my bachelor's degree, I developed an interest in econometric models and the use of statistics
to help a business. Due to my knowledge of data science and my interest in economics, I chose the
Master in Business Analytics. I did well in my bachelor's degree (1.65 GPA) and successfully
completed my studies in November 2020. I did my bachelor thesis on the subject of fingerprint
sensors. For the project I used an optical fingerprint sensor and worked with the Arduino IDE
software.
Not only that I have experience of working as a Model for photoshoots and video shoots for
Volkswagon, Dresden.
Overall I consider myself a strong applicant for the Summer School 2022 on Innovation and
Entrepreneurship with my social commitments, creativity and academics records.
Thanking You
Shashank Bhati
